metaTitle: Christmas Elf Set | The Christmas Elf
metaContent: Our Christmas Elf Set includes your very own elf, a personalised letter  from Father Christmas, magic snow and a candy cane. Buy online now!

product.title: Christmas Elf Set
product.caption: Full elf set
info: The elf is approx 11inches long and comply with EN71 / CE safety regulations and are suitable from the age of 3+ due to small parts. Adult supervision is required.
product.smallPrint: Please note these elf's are intended as an occasional/decorative toy.
productInfo: 1 elf(boy or girl) - you have the choice of a boy with shorts or with a tunic (please use drop down box to indicate your choice). The two elf set options contains 1 boy and 1 girl elf. If you wish to change this combination, please contact us via email before purchase
1 personalised letter from Father Christmas to explain to your child the purpose of the Elf's visit.
product.productNoticeText: Girl Elf is now out of stock!
